name: @crowdhouse/design-tokens
description: [Domus](https://zeroheight.com/6tcgsmy4n/p/85bc42-domus-design-system) is our design system and tokens are our design decisions, represented as data for a systematically unified and cohesive Crowdhouse experience.

scripts.prepack: npm run build && npx json-to-scss colors.pure.json _colors.scss --p='%colors-' --fk && sed -i -e 's/^%colors/$colors/g' _colors.scss
scripts.build: node src/transform.js && npx quicktype colors.pure.json -o colors.quicktype.ts && npx quicktype typography.pure.json -o typography.quicktype.ts && npx tsc

author: Crowdhouse FrontEnd Team
